author: Magda Seguin
message: I dont think a single conviction should be used to denigrate this witness...si many others like Mdluli did wore and he was exonerated Scapegoating this witness is a normal part of the legal procedure I suppose but it has nothing to do with the matter at hand other than to put it on record for a consequent court hereafter Mdluli did worse and he was left to roam for nearly a decade Acquited is the keyword inconsiderate driving? ...lol
